mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDING f, FUNDHISTORY fh
WHERE f.FNO = fh.FH_FNO and fh.FH_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} and f.fstartdate <= SYSDATE and f.fenddate>= SYSDATE and f.FTYPE= 'MONEY'

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, FTITLE , FHVALUE ,FSTATUS, FSTARTDATE , FENDDATE , FHDATE, FNO FROM(SELECT f.FTITLE , fh.FHVALUE , f.FSTATUS, f.FSTARTDATE ,f.FENDDATE , fh.FHDATE , f.FNO FROM FUNDING f, FUNDHISTORY fh
WHERE f.FNO = fh.FH_FNO and fh.FH_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} and f.FTYPE= 'MONEY' and f.fstartdate <= SYSDATE and f.fenddate >= SYSDATE ORDER BY fh.FHDATE DESC)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDING f, FUNDHISTORY fh
WHERE f.FNO = fh.FH_FNO and fh.FH_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} and f.fenddate < SYSDATE and f.FTYPE= 'MONEY'

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, FTITLE , FHVALUE ,FSTATUS, FSTARTDATE , FENDDATE , FHDATE, FNO FROM(SELECT f.FTITLE , fh.FHVALUE , f.FSTATUS, f.FSTARTDATE ,f.FENDDATE , fh.FHDATE, f.FNO FROM FUNDING f, FUNDHISTORY fh
WHERE f.FNO = fh.FH_FNO and fh.FH_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} and f.FTYPE= 'MONEY' and f.fenddate < SYSDATE ORDER BY fh.FHDATE DESC)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDING f, FUNDHISTORY fh
WHERE f.FNO = fh.FH_FNO and fh.FH_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} and f.fstartdate <= SYSDATE and f.fenddate>= SYSDATE and f.FTYPE= 'ITEM'

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, FNO, FTITLE , FHVALUE ,FSTATUS, FSTARTDATE , FENDDATE , FHDATE, INAME FROM(SELECT f.fno, f.FTITLE , fh.FHVALUE , f.FSTATUS, f.FSTARTDATE ,f.FENDDATE , fh.FHDATE, FI.INAME FROM FUNDING f JOIN FUNDHISTORY FH ON(F.FNO=FH.FH_FNO) JOIN FUNDHISTORYDETAIL FHD ON(FHD.FHD_FHNO=FH.FHNO) JOIN FUNDITEM FI ON (FI.INO=FHD.FHD_INO)
WHERE fh.FH_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} and f.FTYPE= 'ITEM' and f.fstartdate <= SYSDATE and f.fenddate >= SYSDATE ORDER BY FH.FHDATE DESC)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDING f, FUNDHISTORY fh
WHERE f.FNO = fh.FH_FNO and fh.FH_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND f.fenddate < SYSDATE and f.FTYPE= 'ITEM'

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, FNO, FTITLE , FHVALUE ,FSTATUS, FSTARTDATE , FENDDATE , FHDATE, INAME FROM(SELECT f.fno, f.FTITLE , fh.FHVALUE , f.FSTATUS, f.FSTARTDATE ,f.FENDDATE , fh.FHDATE, FI.INAME FROM FUNDING f JOIN FUNDHISTORY FH ON(F.FNO=FH.FH_FNO) JOIN FUNDHISTORYDETAIL FHD ON(FHD.FHD_FHNO=FH.FHNO) JOIN FUNDITEM FI ON (FI.INO=FHD.FHD_INO)
WHERE fh.FH_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} and f.FTYPE= 'ITEM' and f.fenddate < SYSDATE ORDER BY FH.FHDATE DESC)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT M.MNICK , MAX(DH.DHVALUE) , COUNT(DHD.DHDCOUNT), SUM(DH.DHVALUE) FROM Member M, DIRECTFUNDHISTORY DH, DIRECTFUNDHISTORYDETAIL DHD WHERE DH.DHSTATUS = 'Y' AND DH.DHNO = DHD.DHD_DHNO AND DH.DH_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND DH.DH_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO GROUP BY M.MNICK)

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, nick, value, cnt, a*cnt as sum ,DHDDATE, MNO FROM( SELECT M.MNICK as nick, MAX(DH.DHVALUE) as value, MAX(DHD.DHDCOUNT) as cnt, SUM(DH.DHVALUE) as a , DHD.DHDDATE, M.MNO FROM Member M, DIRECTFUNDHISTORY DH, DIRECTFUNDHISTORYDETAIL DHD WHERE DH.DHSTATUS = 'Y' AND DH.DHNO = DHD.DHD_DHNO AND DH.DH_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND DH.DH_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO GROUP BY M.MNICK, DH.DHVALUE, DHD.DHDDATE, M.MNO )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT M.MNICK , MAX(DH.DHVALUE) , COUNT(DHD.DHDCOUNT), SUM(DH.DHVALUE) FROM Member M, DIRECTFUNDHISTORY DH, DIRECTFUNDHISTORYDETAIL DHD WHERE DH.DHSTATUS = 'N' AND DH.DHNO = DHD.DHD_DHNO AND DH.DH_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND DH.DH_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO GROUP BY M.MNICK)

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, nick, value, cnt, a*cnt as sum ,DHDDATE, MNO FROM( SELECT M.MNICK as nick, MAX(DH.DHVALUE) as value, MAX(DHD.DHDCOUNT) as cnt, SUM(DH.DHVALUE) as a , DHD.DHDDATE, M.MNO FROM Member M, DIRECTFUNDHISTORY DH, DIRECTFUNDHISTORYDETAIL DHD WHERE DH.DHSTATUS = 'N' AND DH.DHNO = DHD.DHD_DHNO AND DH.DH_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND DH.DH_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO GROUP BY M.MNICK, DH.DHVALUE, DHD.DHDDATE, M.MNO )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LETTER L, MEMBER M WHERE LESTATUS = 'Y' AND LETYPE = 1 AND L.LE_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND L.LE_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, MNICK, LETITLE, LEWRITEDATE, LENO FROM( SELECT M.MNICK, L.LETITLE, L.LEWRITEDATE, L.LENO FROM LETTER L, MEMBER M WHERE LESTATUS = 'Y' AND LETYPE = 1 AND L.LE_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND L.LE_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO ORDER BY L.LEWRITEDATE DESC)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LETTER L, MEMBER M , DIRECTFUNDHISTORY DF WHERE DF.DHSTATUS='N' AND LESTATUS = 'Y' AND LETYPE = 1 AND L.LE_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND DF.DH_MNO_TAKE = L.LE_MNO_TAKE AND L.LE_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, MNICK, LETITLE, LEWRITEDATE, LENO FROM( SELECT M.MNICK, L.LETITLE, L.LEWRITEDATE , L.LENO FROM LETTER L, MEMBER M, DIRECTFUNDHISTORY DF WHERE LESTATUS = 'Y' AND LETYPE = 1 AND L.LE_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND L.LE_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO AND DF.DH_MNO_GIVE = L.LE_MNO_GIVE AND DF.DHSTATUS='N' AND DF.DH_MNO_TAKE = L.LE_MNO_TAKE ORDER BY L.LEWRITEDATE DESC)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LETTER L, MEMBER M WHERE LESTATUS = 'Y' AND LETYPE = 2 AND L.LE_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND L.LE_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, MNICK, LETITLE, LEWRITEDATE, LENO FROM( SELECT M.MNICK, L.LETITLE, L.LEWRITEDATE, L.LENO FROM LETTER L, MEMBER M WHERE LESTATUS = 'Y' AND LETYPE = 2 AND L.LE_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND L.LE_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO ORDER BY L.LEWRITEDATE DESC)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LETTER L, MEMBER M WHERE LESTATUS = 'Y' AND LETYPE = 3 AND L.LE_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND L.LE_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, MNICK, LETITLE, LEWRITEDATE, LENO FROM( SELECT M.MNICK, L.LETITLE, L.LEWRITEDATE, L.LENO FROM LETTER L, MEMBER M WHERE LESTATUS = 'Y' AND LETYPE = 3 AND L.LE_MNO_GIVE = #{mno} AND L.LE_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO ORDER BY L.LEWRITEDATE DESC)
SELECT * FROM LETTER L, MEMBER M WHERE LENO = #{leNo} AND LESTATUS = 'Y' AND L.LE_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDINTEREST FI, MEMBER M WHERE FI.FISTATUS = 'Y' AND FI.FI_MNO = #{mno} AND FI.FI_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM ,MNICK, MPR ,FIDATE, FI_MNO_TAKE, MNO FROM( SELECT M.MNICK, M.MPR ,FI.FIDATE, FI.FI_MNO_TAKE , M.MNO FROM FUNDINTEREST FI, MEMBER M WHERE FI.FISTATUS = 'Y' AND FI.FI_MNO = #{mno} AND FI.FI_MNO_TAKE = M.MNO AND FI.FITYPE = 1 ORDER BY FI.FIDATE)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDINTEREST FI, MEMBER M WHERE FI.FISTATUS = 'Y' AND FI.FI_MNO = #{mno} AND FI.FI_MNO = M.MNO AND FI.FITYPE = 2 ORDER BY FI.FIDATE

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, MNICK , FTITLE, FIDATE, FI_FNO, FNO FROM( SELECT M.MNICK ,F.FTITLE, FI.FIDATE , FI.FI_FNO, F.FNO FROM FUNDINTEREST FI, MEMBER M , FUNDING F WHERE FI.FISTATUS = 'Y' AND FI.FI_MNO = #{mno} AND FI.FITYPE = 2 AND F.FNO = FI.FI_FNO AND F.FWRITER = M.MNO ORDER BY FI.FIDATE )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDINTEREST FI, MEMBER M WHERE FI.FISTATUS = 'Y' AND FI.FI_MNO = #{mno} AND FI.FI_MNO = M.MNO AND FI.FITYPE = 3 ORDER BY FI.FIDATE

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, MNICK , FTITLE, FIDATE, FI_FNO, FNO FROM( SELECT M.MNICK ,F.FTITLE, FI.FIDATE , FI.FI_FNO, F.FNO FROM FUNDINTEREST FI, MEMBER M , FUNDING F WHERE FI.FISTATUS = 'Y' AND FI.FI_MNO = #{mno} AND FI.FITYPE = 3 AND F.FNO = FI.FI_FNO AND F.FWRITER = M.MNO ORDER BY FI.FIDATE )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE QWRITER = 'N'

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, QNO,QDATE,QTITLE,QCONTENT,QANSWER,QWRITER, MNICK FROM( SELECT Q.QNO,Q.QDATE,Q.QTITLE,Q.QCONTENT,Q.QANSWER,Q.QWRITER, M.MNICK FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON(Q.Q_MNO = M.MNO) WHERE QWRITER = 'N' ORDER BY QDATE DESC, QANSWER NULLS FIRST )
